trans-unit.source: Represents an XML document that specifies a list of file system directory paths that should not be searched for references to add to a Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 文件，指定要加入至 Web 服務探索文件的參考不能搜尋的檔案系統目錄路徑的清單。

trans-unit.source: The DynamicDiscoveryDocument class is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: DynamicDiscoveryDocument 類別受雇<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>類別的<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法，用來處理 HTTP 要求的探索文件。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>

trans-unit.source: The request specifies another document, an XML dynamic discovery document containing a list of directories to exclude.
trans-unit.target: 此要求指定另一個文件，其中包含要排除的目錄清單的 XML 動態探索文件。

trans-unit.source: The list corresponds to the DynamicDiscoveryDocument class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A> property and contains directories at or below the directory containing the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 清單對應至 DynamicDiscoveryDocument 類別<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A>屬性且包含目錄或包含 XML 文件的目錄下。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A>

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，任何類別需要由開發人員直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file-system directory paths that should not be searched for references to add to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要加入探索文件的參考不能搜尋的檔案系統目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: The exclude paths are serialized to an XML dynamic discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 排除路徑序列化為 XML 動態探索文件。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes an XML document into a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化成 XML 文件<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This `static` method takes an XML document, represented as a <xref:System.IO.Stream>, and converts in to a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument> .
trans-unit.target: 這`static`方法會採用 XML 文件，以表示<xref:System.IO.Stream>，並在轉換至<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument>。</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object from which the XML dynamic discovery document is deserialized.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>XML 動態探索文件會從其中還原序列化的物件。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Contains the dynamic discovery document namespace "urn:schemas-dynamicdiscovery:disco.2000-03-17".
trans-unit.target: 包含動態探索文件命名空間"urn︰ 結構描述-dynamicdiscovery:disco.2000-03-17"。

trans-unit.source: Serializes a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref> instance into an XML document specified as an output stream.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化<xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument"></xref>指定為輸出資料流的 XML 文件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to which the XML dynamic discovery document is serialized.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Stream>序列化 XML 動態探索文件的物件。</xref:System.IO.Stream>
